Vocal Search

Press S or click on the microphone and speak!

Learn More about Vocal Search.

About Vocal Search

Have you ever wondered how cool it would be if you could talk to a web page instead of having to type stuff into forms?

With Vocal Search you can. Do you feel like having a beer? Just say so! Press S or click on the microphone and say, for instance:

I feel like having a beer, show me pubs around here

The browser will first translate your voice into text, then use a NLU API to interpret the text and extract the search terms and finally run a query on the HERE Places database to recommend relevant places.

Press ESC to hide this dialog.
